onboarding.subtitle: Your 5AM companion for building discipline
onboarding.selectTime: What time do you want to wake up?

home.quote: The early morning has gold in its mouth

settings.title: Settings
settings.name: First Name
settings.resetWarning: This will delete all your progress. Are you sure?

natalie.welcome: Hello {{name}}! I'm Natalie, your guide on this 5AM journey. Together, we'll build the discipline that changes everything.
natalie.checkIn1: Beautiful work, {{name}}! Every sunrise you show up is a victory.
natalie.checkIn7: Seven days strong! You're not just waking up early - you're becoming someone new.
natalie.checkIn30: 30 days of discipline! {{name}}, you've proven that you can do hard things.
natalie.motivation: Remember why you started. That fire inside you? It's real, and it's powerful.
natalie.struggle: I see you, {{name}}. This is hard. But you're here, and that means you haven't given up.
natalie.celebrate: Yes! Let's celebrate this moment. You're doing something most people only dream about.

max.welcome: Hey {{name}}, Max here. Let's cut to it - 5AM isn't about waking up early. It's about becoming unbreakable.
max.checkIn1: Day one done. Now do it again tomorrow. That's how champions are built.
max.checkIn7: One week. That's seven times you chose discipline over comfort. Respect.
max.checkIn30: A full month. You didn't just wake up at 5AM - you built a new identity. Keep going.
max.motivation: You know what you need to do. Stop overthinking it and do the work.
max.struggle: Struggling? Good. That means you're growing. Now get up and push through it.
max.celebrate: Hell yeah! But don't get comfortable. Tomorrow's another battle.

deepMode.title: Deep Mode Session
deepMode.subtitle: Let's talk through what's on your mind

prompts.whatsBothering: What's really bothering you about waking up early?
prompts.biggestChallenge: What's your biggest challenge right now?
prompts.whyImportant: Why is this 5AM habit important to you?
prompts.whatIfSuccess: What would your life look like if you mastered this?
prompts.whatHelps: What helps you most when things get hard?
